++ System Management

System Management is how the system and SystemComponents are [Managed].
    * In Windows, this is Control Panel.
    * The SystemConfigurationScreen is responsible for SM in TheSystem.

Items that can be managed include:

    * [Hardware]
     * PhysicalMemory
    * [Installation]
    * LogicalMemory
    * [Accounts]
    * [Installation] of [Applications]
     * see ApplicationManagement
